** IMPORTANT NOTICE **

Always be careful when installing cracked anti-virus software as it may install a backdoor (it happened to me) and every 5 minutes I would keep getting a BSoD (blue-screen of death) so if you do not want to mess up your computer the best thing to do is to not install pirated anti-virus as once it's on there it has the potential of masking viruses that should be detected.

** **
This isn't cracked, it's freeware anyway and the file sizes seem to be right. Thanks for your important notice!
